sentences.sContent: There's a total reassessment of what people want out of life.
sentences.sCn: 对于人们对生活有什么样的期待有了重新评价。

synos.tran: [经]重新评估；重新估价；重新考虑

trans.tranCn: 重新评估；[经] 重新估价；重新考虑
trans.tranOther: If you make a reassessment of something, you think about it and decide whether you need to change your opinion about it
